mapper.select: select id, method_name methodName, rateplan_id ratePlanId, hotel_id hotelId, room_type_id roomTypeId, additional_id additionalId, method_params methodParams, method_reuslt methodReuslt, method_tick methodTick, log_info logInfo, op_time opTime, operator, op_ip opIp from method_log where id=#{id}
